fix: resolve all Dependabot security alerts

- Fix http-proxy-middleware body parsing issues (medium)
- Fix @babel/helpers and @babel/runtime RegExp complexity (medium)
- Fix estree-util-value-to-estree prototype pollution (medium)
- Fix brace-expansion ReDoS vulnerability (low)
- Fix on-headers response header manipulation (low)
- Temporarily disable rspackBundler for Docusaurus 3.9.2 compatibility
